refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: gnome-disk-image-mounter can be used to mount disk images. Both regular files and GVfs URIs (such as smb://filer/media/file.iso) can be used in the URI parameter. If no URIs are given and a window server is running, a graphical file chooser will be presented.
If a disk image is partitioned, all mountable partitions in the image will be mounted (except for e.g. firmware partitions). Otherwise the whole disk image will be mounted.
If a disk image is not mountable or mounting fails, an error will be presented either on standard error or in a dialog box if a window server is running.
By default the disk images are attached read-only, use --writable to change this.

refsect1.title: RETURN VALUE
refsect1.para: gnome-disk-image-mounter returns 0 on success and non-zero on failure.
